attributes.action: End the concept of lifelong, professional MP's
attributes.additional_details: We live in a world where the elite are bred for politics. This is counter intuitive to democracy. Professional MP's primary concern becomes their job. There should be no such thing as a professional MP. This should be properly debated. This is an interim suggestion of imposing a term limit to ensure that real people who come from the constituancies are encouraged to represent the people who live in their area.
